title: Project Mode
subtitle: Governed initiatives inside this workspace. Humans approve intent. The system executes. Chronicle records proof.

projectSelector.label: Active Project
projectSelector.empty: No projects yet. Import a roadmap or checklist to create a project.

nextRunnable.title: Recommended Next Ticket
nextRunnable.helpText: This ticket has no unmet dependencies and is safe to start.

eligibleTickets.title: Eligible Tickets
eligibleTickets.subtitle: Multiple tickets are eligible. Select one to start.
eligibleTickets.whyEligibleNote: Evidence used for ranking. Human decides execution.

explanations.title: Why Tickets Are Not Runnable
explanations.footer: Explanations are derived from Chronicle events.

backpressure.title: Backpressure Active
backpressure.body: New executions are paused to protect system stability.
backpressure.resumedBody: System is operating normally. Executions can proceed.

controls.authorizeExecuteConfirmation: You are authorizing execution of one bounded attempt. No changes will be applied without further approval.
controls.executingBanner: One attempt is currently running. Complete or review it before starting another.

governance.footer: All state shown here is derived from Chronicle receipts.

footer: Humans decide. The system executes. Chronicle remembers.

import.title: Import Plan
import.description: Import a roadmap or checklist to create tickets.

expansion.title: Review Expansion
expansion.description: Review the proposed ticket DAG before approval.

parallelSets.title: Parallel Set (Proposed)
parallelSets.subtitle: Parallel execution requires explicit approval.
parallelSets.warningNoteRequired: A note is required when warnings exist.

safetySummary.title: Why This Is Safe
safetySummary.subtitle: Evidence used to recommend safety. Humans decide.
safetySummary.disclaimer: This is the evidence used to recommend safety. The human operator makes the final decision.

banner.proposed: A parallel set has been proposed. Review and approve to enable parallel execution.
banner.approved: Parallel set approved. Click 'Execute Approved Set' to start.
banner.noEligible: Not enough eligible tickets for parallel execution.
